modShortDescription: Simply a working wood burning stove that you can cook on. Methos used Valmars Working Ovens and Sinks as an example. Hopefully someone enjoys it.
modDescription:
Simply a working wood burning stove that you can cook on. Methos used [Valmars Working Ovens and Sinks](https://7daystodiemods.com/working-ovens-and-sinks/) as an example.

Quite happy how it turned out, especially the flames which took a very minor tweak to the offsets to get it lined up.

Hopefully someone enjoys it.

## Changelog

* Tested in A19.3
* Perk requirement removed.

**[Download](https://www.dropbox.com/s/51lzcxvjqy8ank9/WorkingWoodBurningStove.zip?dl=1)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17996-working-wood-burning-stove/).

**Credits:** Methos
